EmailTemplate.name: AM/SAM application acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for applying to be an Associate Mentor with The Challenge Network. We will be in touch with all successful applicants by Wednesday, May 30th. In the meantime, if you have any questions please email associate.mentors@the-challenge.org.uk.
Thanks again,
The Challenge Society
